member.name: P:Sanatana.Notifications.NDR.AWS.AmazonNDRParser`1.SourceAddressToVerify
member.summary: Source email address. If specified, then only NDR with matching source will be handled.

member.name: M:Sanatana.Notifications.NDR.AWS.AmazonNDRParser`1.ParseBounceInfo(System.String)
member.summary: Handle request from AWS SNS with NDR.

member.name: F:Sanatana.Notifications.NDR.AWS.AmazonBounceSubType.Undetermined
member.summary: Amazon SES was unable to determine a specific bounce reason.

member.name: F:Sanatana.Notifications.NDR.AWS.AmazonBounceSubType.General
member.summary: Permanent - Amazon SES received a general hard bounce and recommends that you remove the recipient's email address from your mailing list. Transient - Amazon SES received a general bounce. You may be able to successfully retry sending to that recipient in the future.

member.name: F:Sanatana.Notifications.NDR.AWS.AmazonBounceSubType.NoEmail
member.summary: Amazon SES received a permanent hard bounce because the target email address does not exist. It is recommended that you remove that recipient from your mailing list.

member.name: F:Sanatana.Notifications.NDR.AWS.AmazonBounceSubType.Suppressed
member.summary: Amazon SES has suppressed sending to this address because it has a recent history of bouncing as an invalid address. For information about how to remove an address from the suppression list, see Removing an Email Address from the Amazon SES Suppression List.

member.name: F:Sanatana.Notifications.NDR.AWS.AmazonBounceSubType.MailboxFull
member.summary: Amazon SES received a mailbox full bounce. You may be able to successfully retry sending to that recipient in the future.

member.name: F:Sanatana.Notifications.NDR.AWS.AmazonBounceSubType.MessageTooLarge
member.summary: Amazon SES received a message too large bounce. You may be able to successfully retry sending to that recipient if you reduce the message size.

member.name: F:Sanatana.Notifications.NDR.AWS.AmazonBounceSubType.ContentRejected
member.summary: Amazon SES received a content rejected bounce. You may be able to successfully retry sending to that recipient if you change the message content.

member.name: F:Sanatana.Notifications.NDR.AWS.AmazonBounceSubType.AttachmentRejected
member.summary: Amazon SES received an attachment rejected bounce. You may be able to successfully retry sending to that recipient if you remove or change the attachment.

member.name: F:Sanatana.Notifications.NDR.AWS.AmazonBounceSubType.Unknown
member.summary: Unknown type

member.name: F:Sanatana.Notifications.NDR.AWS.AmazonBounceType.Undetermined
member.summary: Amazon SES was unable to determine a specific bounce reason.

member.name: F:Sanatana.Notifications.NDR.AWS.AmazonBounceType.Permanent
member.summary: Amazon SES received a general hard bounce and recommends that you remove the recipient's email address from your mailing list.

member.name: F:Sanatana.Notifications.NDR.AWS.AmazonBounceType.Transient
member.summary: Amazon SES received a general bounce. You may be able to successfully retry sending to that recipient in the future.

member.name: F:Sanatana.Notifications.NDR.AWS.AmazonBounceType.Unknown
member.summary: Unknown type

member.name: F:Sanatana.Notifications.NDR.AWS.AmazonComplaintFeedbackType.Abuse
member.summary: Indicates unsolicited email or some other kind of email abuse.

member.name: F:Sanatana.Notifications.NDR.AWS.AmazonComplaintFeedbackType.AuthFailure
member.summary: Indicates unsolicited email or some other kind of email abuse.

member.name: F:Sanatana.Notifications.NDR.AWS.AmazonComplaintFeedbackType.Fraud
member.summary: Indicates some kind of fraud or phishing activity.

member.name: F:Sanatana.Notifications.NDR.AWS.AmazonComplaintFeedbackType.NotSpam
member.summary: Indicates that the entity providing the report does not consider the message to be spam. This may be used to correct a message that was incorrectly tagged or categorized as spam.

member.name: F:Sanatana.Notifications.NDR.AWS.AmazonComplaintFeedbackType.Other
member.summary: Indicates any other feedback that does not fit into other registered types.

member.name: F:Sanatana.Notifications.NDR.AWS.AmazonComplaintFeedbackType.Virus
member.summary: Reports that a virus is found in the originating message.

member.name: F:Sanatana.Notifications.NDR.AWS.AmazonComplaintFeedbackType.Unknown
member.summary: Unknown type

member.name: P:Sanatana.Notifications.NDR.AWS.SettingsAwsNdr.ConfirmSubsription
member.summary: Accept subsciption on receiving SNS messages on this address.
